DOC.brief_summary: Clinical Evaluation including System Accuracy, User Performance, System Use, Instructions for Use and Marketing Claims Evaluation.
DOC.brief_title: Project BLOOM Regulatory Clinical Evaluation - System Accuracy, User Performance and System Use Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Summary of Able to voluntarily provide written informed consent to participate in the study. User Performance Accuracy Testing Only: SelfMonitoring Subject is currently performing unassisted selfmonitoring of blood glucose. For subjects participating in the In Vivo Glucose adjustment procedure age range is 18 45. Summary of Female subjects who are pregnant or lactating. Subjects who, in the opinion of the Investigator, are unsuitable for participation in the study. User Performance Accuracy Testing Only Prior involvement with the investigational BGMS being used in this study.
